alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Desha; Jefferson; Lincoln; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 7:16PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Desha, southeastern Monroe, southeastern Jefferson, northeastern Lincoln and Arkansas Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 715 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Watkins Corner to near St. Charles to near Gillett. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gillett... St. Charles... Yancopin... Little Bayou Meto Park... Merrisach Lake... Langford... Palmer... Douglas... Trusten Holder WMA... De Witt... Arkansas Post... De Luce... Tichnor... Morgan Point Recreation Area... Weber... Sarassa... Cross Roads in Monroe County... Pendleton... Ethel... Crocketts Bluff... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
